text: Bani Isroil ʙaroi Pajomʙari Alloh va rasulaş Muhammad (sallalohu alajhi va sallam) guftand: «Dilhoi mo dar parda ast va suxani tu ʙa qalʙi mo nameguzarad». Na, amr in tavr nest, cunon ki iddao kardand, ʙalki dilaşon la'nat karda şudaast va ʙar on muhre nihoda şudaast va az rahmati Alloh, ʙa saʙaʙi kufre, ki mevarzand, ʙerun şudand. Pas kame az onho imon meovarand va hol on ki imonaşon ʙa onho naf' namerasonad
